page.title: 07Local History East Huntspill
page.content: One local man told us about a local history.The teachers smacked the legs of the children. He used to ride to school. He didn't play football or athletics but did play cricket. He didn't like music and he didn't go to discos. He wore grey shorts and grey shirts. He went to bed about 10 o'clock. He only had a television when he was nine. There were five children in their family and they had few roast dinners. There were only a few houses in the village when he moved there 45 years ago,and the roads were very narrow.Since then new houses have been built and roads improved These are the main changes he has noticed.
